calculator.title: I-485 Prediction
calculator.disclaimer: The information is updated monthly according to the latest Visa Bulletin updates.
calculator.disclaimerBacklog: Future backlog regression is not included to the estimations.

timeline.title: Timeline Calculator
timeline.eb2PdTooltip: Average days diff between today and filing date in the Visa Bulletin
timeline.eb3PdTooltip: Average days diff between today and filing date in the Visa Bulletin
timeline.priorityDateWaitDesc: Waiting for priority date to become current

tooltips.eb1NoPermRequired: EB1 category does not require PERM Labor Certification
tooltips.eb1RegularProcessing: Based on regular processing times for EB1 category
tooltips.eb1NoPriorityDate: EB1 typically has no priority date backlog except for certain countries
tooltips.i485Processing: Average USCIS processing time for I-485
tooltips.i485NoPremium: Average USCIS processing time for I-485 (premium not available)
tooltips.premiumProcessing15: Premium processing guarantees 15 business days processing
tooltips.niwNoPermRequired: National Interest Waiver exempts from PERM requirement
tooltips.niwLongerProcessing: Longer processing due to complex NIW criteria evaluation
tooltips.niwPriorityDate: Similar to regular EB2 category wait times
tooltips.premiumProcessing45: Premium processing guarantees 45 business days processing
tooltips.permProcessingSteps: Includes prevailing wage, recruitment period, and PERM application processing
tooltips.eb2RegularProcessing: Based on regular processing times for EB2 category
tooltips.eb2PriorityDate: Average wait time for most countries (longer for certain countries)
tooltips.eb3RegularProcessing: Based on regular processing times for EB3 category
tooltips.eb3PriorityDate: Longer wait times due to higher demand in EB3 category
